Ban Commands: //ban_menu - Call menu of ban system. Usage - //ban_menu //ban - Ban player. Usage - //ban Char_name days resone //unban - Unban player. Usage - //unban Char_name //accban - Ban player account. Usage - //accban Target or Account Name //accunban - Unban player account. Usage - //accunban Account Name //hwid_ban - HWID Ban player. Usage - //hwidban Char_name Resone //kick - Kick player from server. Usage - //kick Char_name //jail - Move player to Jail. Usage - //jail Char_name days resone //charip - Show Character IP. Usage - //charip Target Read GM Ban Read GM Skills Read GM Clan Read GM Residence(Castle Edit) Read GM Seven Sing Read GM Olympiad Read GM Cursed Weapons Read GM Zone
